name: Structure (itch)
description:
Winds rack the land, and reveal something shining in the barren wasteland you call home. Within is to be found either mastery, or escape.

Game made in a week for Myst Jam.

With this I've tried to create something resembling the wonderful mechanical puzzles found in the Myst series. The game is officially over once you find the note addressed to the Traveller.

Please enjoy, and thanks,

Oliver
